sentences.en: A 0038 Discus Tea Cake has a sharp straight edge.
sentences.cn: A0038铁饼茶有很直切的边缘.

sentences.en: Discus and javelin throwing, long jumping and wrestling were added later.
sentences.cn: 后来又增加了掷铁饼、投标枪 、 跳远和摔跤等项目.

sentences.en: He gave the discus a tremendous heave.
He wanted to throw the discus back to Apollo.
sentences.cn: 想要把它丢回给阿波罗.

sentences.en: He won the discus at the Montreal Olympics.
sentences.cn: 他在蒙特利尔奥运会的掷铁饼比赛中夺了冠。

sentences.en: How could he ever open up a discus ion with her now?
sentences.cn: 现在他将怎样和她展开一场讨论 呢 ?

sentences.en: I see Britain did well in the discus.
sentences.cn: 我看英国队在铁饼项目中表现不错.

sentences.en: In the discus throw events, Lewes scored 67.52 m at the final throw.
sentences.cn: 在掷铁饼项目中, 刘易斯最后一次投掷的成绩是67.52米.

sentences.en: In the discus throwing event, Ley scored 67.52 m the final throw.
sentences.cn: 在掷铁饼的项目中, 刘易斯最后一次试掷的成绩是67.52米.

sentences.en: The discus was kind of the clutch event.
sentences.cn: 掷铁饼可以说是件紧要关头的事儿.

sentences.en: The scheme for the hierarchically constructed layout design is also discus - sed.
sentences.cn: 结合版图的分级设计还讨论了分级设计规则检查方法.

sentences.en: The young track and field athlete could already hurl the discus 60 yards.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻的田径运动员已能把铁饼投掷60码远.

sentences.en: These different views make discus of inherit of stock right more complicated.
sentences.cn: 这些观点的不同,使得对股权继承问题的探讨更加复杂.

sentences.en: They discus how to promote cooperation between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 他们讨论如何促进两国间的合作.

sentences.en: Throwing events comprise the javelin, discus, hammer and shot put.
sentences.cn: 投掷项目包括标枪 、 铁饼 、 链球和铅球.
